addProject(string).details: Using SafeMath library for preventing overflow vulnerability

breakCircuit(bool).details: Using the Circuit braker design pattern

params._stopped: boolean state variable for stopping the contract

closeProject(uint256).details: Sending Ethers with call function and check the result

kill().details: Destroy the smart contract using selfdestruct() function that returns all funds to the owner address

returnProject(uint256).details: Solidity doesnt support the struct return type in public function calls
returnProject(uint256).return: The project nameThe project idThe project priceThe project statusThe employer addressThe freelancer address

withdraw(uint256).details: Set the price to zero and the status of the project to Closed

addProject(string).notice: Add a project as an employer

breakCircuit(bool).notice: Stopp contract functionality in case of a bug is detected

closeProject(uint256).notice: Close the commited project as an employer, Ethers will be sent to the freelancer

commitProject(uint256).notice: Commit the project that you picked as a freelancer

pickProject(uint256).notice: Pick an open project as a freelancer

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw funds to the employer in an emergency
